data.name: Staff of Homa
data.passiveDescription: HP increased by {{20//25//30//35//40%}}. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on {{0.8//1//1.2//1.4//1.6%}} of the wielder’s Max HP. When the wielder’s HP is less than 50%, this ATK Bonus is increased by an additional {{1//1.2//1.4//1.6//1.8%}} of Max HP.
